verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* after they were come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
Let the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* also \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* at his appointed \w season|strong="H4150"\w*.

In the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of this \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, ye shall \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* it in his appointed \w season|strong="H4150"\w*: according to all the \w rites|strong="H2708"\w* of it, and according to all the \w ceremonies|strong="H4941"\w* thereof, shall ye \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* it.\f + \fr 9.3 \ft at even: Heb. between the two evenings\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they should \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*.

And they \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* on the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*: according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And there were certain \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, who were \w defiled|strong="H2931"\w* by the dead \w body|strong="H5315"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, that they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and they \w came|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

And \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, We \add are\add* \w defiled|strong="H2931"\w* by the dead \w body|strong="H5315"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*: wherefore are we kept \w back|strong="H1639"\w*, that we may not \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in his appointed \w season|strong="H4150"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Stand \w still|strong="H5975"\w*, and I will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* what the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w command|strong="H6680"\w* concerning you.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of you or of your \w posterity|strong="H1755"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* by reason of a dead \w body|strong="H5315"\w*, or \add be\add* in a \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, yet he shall \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w* they shall \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* it, \add and\add* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it with unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* and \w bitter|strong="H4844"\w* \add herbs\add*.

They shall \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* none of it unto the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, nor \w break|strong="H7665"\w* any \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* of it: according to all the \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* they shall \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* it.

But the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \add is\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*, and is not in a \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w forbeareth|strong="H2308"\w* to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*, even the same \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from among his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: because he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* not the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in his appointed \w season|strong="H4150"\w*, that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

And if a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* shall \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* among you, and will \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; according to the \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*, and according to the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* thereof, so shall he \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: ye shall have \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w*, both for the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, and for him that was \w born|strong="H0249"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ And on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* was reared \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \add namely\add*, the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*: and at \w even|strong="H6153"\w* there was upon the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* as it were the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

So it was \w alway|strong="H8548"\w*: the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* it \add by day\add*, and the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And \w when|strong="H6310"\w* the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* was taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, then \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w*: and in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w abode|strong="H7931"\w*, there the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* pitched their \w tents|strong="H2583"\w*.

At the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w*, and at the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* they \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w*: as long \w as|strong="H3117"\w* the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w abode|strong="H7931"\w* upon the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* they \w rested|strong="H2583"\w* in their tents.

And when the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* tarried \w long|strong="H0748"\w* upon the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, then the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* not.\f + \fr 9.19 \ft tarried…: Heb. prolonged\f*

And \add so\add* it \w was|strong="H3426"\w*, when the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* was a \w few|strong="H4557"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* upon the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*; according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* they \w abode|strong="H2583"\w* in their tents, and according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w*.

And \add so\add* it \w was|strong="H3426"\w*, when the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* abode from \w even|strong="H6153"\w* unto the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \add that\add* the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* was taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, then they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w*: whether \add it was\add* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w* or by \w night|strong="H3915"\w* that the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* was taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w*.\f + \fr 9.21 \ft abode: Heb. was\f*

Or \add whether it were\add* two \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, or a \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, or a \w year|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w tarried|strong="H0748"\w* upon the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w remaining|strong="H7931"\w* thereon, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w abode|strong="H2583"\w* in their tents, and \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* not: but when it was taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w*.

At the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* they \w rested|strong="H2583"\w* in the tents, and at the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w*: they \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, at the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
